profile.description: Over 19999 years of experience in web development. Passionate about new technologies and Star Wars. Especially the HTML ecosystem and the Wookies.

experience.title: Experience
experience.first-job-description: As a Quality Analyst at TikTok, my job was to ensure that the platform functions correctly and provides the best user experience, identifying and resolving technical and content issues.
experience.last-job-description: As a Quality Analyst at YouTube, my mission was to ensure that the platform functions optimally and that users have a high-quality viewing experience.

hobbies.first-hobbie-description: Animal-assisted therapy uses interaction with trained animals to improve the physical, emotional, and social health of people. It is used in various therapies and can help reduce stress, improve self-esteem, and promote socialization.

project.project1-text1: This page allows us to see different types of images through a user search. A project made with VITE, made through components to better distribute and reuse our code. The Unsplash API is used to make requests and allow us to obtain different images according to the search.
project.project1-text2: It incorporates functionalities such as account creation and element saving.
